wikispeech-desc: A text-to-speech tool to make Wikimedia's projects more accessible for people that for different reasons have difficulties reading.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-summary: Split a page's HTML content into segments.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-param-page: The title of the page to segment.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-param-removet:
HTML tags that should be removed completely during cleaning, as a JSON object of the format: 
{
  "tag1": true,
  "tag2": "css-class",
  "tag3": ["css-class-1", "css-class-2"]
}
where tag1 is always removed, tag2 is only removed if it also has the CSS class css-class and tag3 is only removed if it also has the CSS class css-class-1 or css-class-2.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-param-segment: HTML tags that should breaks segments.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-example-1: Segment the main page using default parameters from the config.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-example-2: Segment using custom parameters. The tag sup is removed and so is div when it has the class toc. The tags h1 and h2 break segments.
apihelp-wikispeech-segment-example-3: Segment the main page on another wiki.
apierror-wikispeech-segment-removetagsin: <var>removetags</var> is not a valid JSON string.
removetags is not of a valid format. It must be an object with the values being booleans, strings or arrays of strings. To not remove any tags, set removetags to empty object, {}.
apihelp-wikispeech-listen-param-revision: Page revision on which the segment is found.
apihelp-wikispeech-listen-param-voice: Voice to use. If not provided the default voice for the language will be used.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-deleted-revis: Deleted revisions cannot be listened to.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-notallowed: You do not have the rights to call this API action.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-invalid-langu: $1 is not a valid language. Should be one of: $2.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-invalid-voice: $1 is not a valid voice. Should be one of: $2.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-failed-gettin: Failed to get page with revision id '$1' from consumer on URL $2.
apierror-wikispeech-consumer-not-allowed: Requests from remote wikis are not allowed.
apihelp-wikispeech-listen-example-3: Request a segment from a revision. Will use cached synthesis if it exists.
apihelp-wikispeech-listen-example-4: Synthesize an utterance from another wiki.
apierror-wikispeech-listen-invalid-input: Input text must not exceed $1 characters, but contained $2 characters.
wikispeech-error-loading-audio-message: This can be caused by bad internet connection or an error on the server. Do you want to retry or stop playback?
wikispeech-lexicon-add-entry-conflict: An entry with that spelling already exists. Select an id to edit that entry or "New" to add a new entry.
wikispeech-lexicon-copyrightnote: By saving changes, you agree to release your contribution under the [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ CC0].
